9.1.18  7:36 pm   Do you feel like this two week deadline is a sustainable routine?

9.1.18  6:52 pm   so i recently had a breakthrough in which i realized that if i post to a public space (that people pay attention to) a deadline, it's so much more real because immediately there are people expecting something of me. even if nobody really cares if i release it on that day or not i still freak out and have to get it done by that time. are you using a similar motivation with sept. 4th and the questions page? i feel like on a large enough scale it could become terrifying and overwhelming but with what i have now it works great
